headline: Builders FirstSource, Inc. (BLDR): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Builders FirstSource, Inc. on Darius Dark Investing’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on BLDR. Builders FirstSource, Inc.’s share was trading at $135.63 as of July 28th. BLDR’s trailing and forward P/E were 17.39 and 16.86, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Builders FirstSource (BLDR), the largest […]

headline: Nation’s top supplier: Housing market pain worse than builders say
summary: New construction is ‘a bit worse’ than public homebuilders are letting on, says Builders FirstSource CEO Peter Jackson.
